#nametype [nametype]: 147

summoned with #247 Contact Beregina (Conjuration 6)

The beregina is a spirit of the shore, where water meets land. Bereginy manifest themselves as incredibly beautiful women. Few mortals would dream of harming a beregina. They are powerful mages of Water, but are also skilled in magic of the land. The bereginy are able to bring a few companions with them under the waves.
